thread.title: Motorcyclist badly injured in crash at Tiverton | West Country (W)
thread.title_full: Motorcyclist badly injured in crash at Tiverton | West Country (W) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Motorcyclist badly injured in crash at Tiverton | West Country (W)
text:
The A38 has been closed at Waterloo Cross and Maidenhead Cross Credit: PA A motorcyclist has been seriously injured in a crash on the A38 near Tiverton in Devon.
The collision, involving a motorcycle, an HGV and a car, happened at 8.30am near Burlescombe.
The A38 has been closed at Waterloo Cross and Maidenhead Cross.
Diversions are in place and police are advising motorists to avoid the area for the time being.
Last updated Mon 27 Jul 2015 Travel Tiverton Burlescombe Devon
